WorkItem.Description: I just tried to do the MvcMusicStore sample and I tried to use a completed sample, which breaks when you try to add an album to a cart. Further investigation has shown that file "MvcMusicStore-v3.0\MvcMusicStore-Completed\MvcMusicStore\Views\ShoppingCart\Index.cshtml" contains <script> reference to jquery of version 1.4.4 but jquery 1.5.1 is included in the sample, so this reference in this file should be updated to 1.5.1
WorkItem.Summary: wrong version of jquery referenced in the completed sample
